input.sentences: this is a picture of a tree .
this is a picture of the ocean .
this is a picture on a cloudy day .
this is a picture of the woods .
this is a picture of the sunsetting .
output.sentences: The first picture he took was that of a tree.
The second picture was the ocean view.
The day became cloudy and the picture was not as good as he had hoped.
He decided to take a picture in the woods.
He then returned to the ocean to take a picture of the sun setting.
